subMembers.name: border
subMembers.description: Configures the legend's border.

subMembers.name: color
subMembers.description: Colors the legend's border.

subMembers.name: cornerRadius
subMembers.description: Makes all the legend's corners rounded.

subMembers.name: dashStyle
subMembers.description: Sets a dash style for the legend's border.

subMembers.name: opacity
subMembers.description: Specifies the transparency of the legend's border.

subMembers.name: visible
subMembers.description: Shows the legend's border.

subMembers.name: width
subMembers.description: Specifies the width of the legend's border in pixels.

properties.name: columnCount
properties.description: Arranges legend items into several columns.

properties.name: columnItemSpacing
properties.description: Specifies an empty space between item columns in pixels.

subMembers.name: font
subMembers.description: Specifies the legend items' font properties.

properties.name: horizontalAlignment
properties.description: Along with [verticalAlignment], specifies the legend's position.

properties.name: itemTextPosition
properties.description: Specifies the text's position relative to the marker in a legend item.

properties.name: itemsAlignment
properties.description: Aligns items in the last column or row (depending on the legend's [orientation]). Applies when legend items are not divided into columns or rows equally.

subMembers.name: bottom
subMembers.description: Specifies the legend's bottom margin in pixels.

subMembers.name: left
subMembers.description: Specifies the legend's left margin in pixels.

subMembers.name: margin
subMembers.description: Generates an empty space, measured in pixels, around the legend.

subMembers.name: right
subMembers.description: Specifies the legend's right margin in pixels.

subMembers.name: top
subMembers.description: Specifies the legend's top margin in pixels.

properties.name: markerSize
properties.description: Specifies the marker's size in a legend item in pixels.

properties.name: orientation
properties.description: Arranges legend items vertically (in a column) or horizontally (in a row). The default value is *"horizontal"* if the **legend**.[horizontalAlignment] is *"center"*. Otherwise, it is *"vertical"*.

properties.name: paddingLeftRight
properties.description: Generates an empty space, measured in pixels, between the legend's left/right border and its items.

properties.name: paddingTopBottom
properties.description: Generates an empty space, measured in pixels, between the legend's top/bottom border and its items.

properties.name: rowCount
properties.description: Arranges legend items in several rows.

properties.name: rowItemSpacing
properties.description: Specifies an empty space between item rows in pixels.

subMembers.name: family
subMembers.default: '"Segoe UI Light", "Helvetica Neue Light", "Segoe UI", "Helvetica Neue", "Trebuchet MS", Verdana, sans-serif'

subMembers.name: font
subMembers.description: Specifies the legend title's font properties.

subMembers.name: horizontalAlignment
subMembers.description: Along with [verticalAlignment], specifies the legend title's position.

subMembers.name: bottom
subMembers.description: Specifies the legend title's bottom margin.

subMembers.name: left
subMembers.description: Specifies the legend title's left margin.

subMembers.name: margin
subMembers.description: Generates space around the legend title.

subMembers.name: right
subMembers.description: Specifies the legend title's right margin.

subMembers.name: top
subMembers.description: Specifies the legend title's top margin.

subMembers.name: placeholderSize
subMembers.description: Reserves a pixel-measured space for the legend title.

subMembers.name: family
subMembers.default: '"Segoe UI Light", "Helvetica Neue Light", "Segoe UI", "Helvetica Neue", "Trebuchet MS", Verdana, sans-serif'

subMembers.name: font
subMembers.description: Specifies the legend subtitle's font properties.

subMembers.name: offset
subMembers.description: Specifies the distance between the legend's [title] and subtitle in pixels.

subMembers.name: subtitle
subMembers.description: Configures the legend subtitle. The subtitle appears only if the [title] is specified.

subMembers.name: text
subMembers.description: Specifies the subtitle's text.

subMembers.name: text
subMembers.description: Specifies the legend title's text.

subMembers.name: title
subMembers.description: Configures the legend title.

subMembers.name: verticalAlignment
subMembers.description: Specifies the legend title's vertical alignment.

properties.name: verticalAlignment
properties.description: Along with [horizontalAlignment], specifies the legend's position.
